text: Pedro Aguayo Cubillo (born 15 July 1939)Profile of Pedro Aguayo Cubillo is an Ecuadorian politician. He was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. He was the Vice President of Ecuador from 2 April 1998 to 10 August 1998 during the last four months of the presidency of Fabián Alarcón. ==References== Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Living people Category:1939 births
title: Pedro Aguayo
